resources.string: Direct path to highest mutual attraction.
Pick the one you like better
Let the algorithm learn the nuanced landscape of your dating preferences versus the general yes/no buckets of swiping.
Illustration that depicts two profiles shown side by side and suggests the user to pick the preferred one.
Get matched for maximum mutual attraction
Tired of hundreds of matches that go nowhere? Based on your ranking, we know exactly who is totally hot for who and you feel the same way.
Start a small number of high quality conversations
Through mutual ranking, you will have much higher quality prospects. Further, everyone is limited to contact only the 10 best matches. Start a genuine conversation with right people.
A diagram that shows message bubbles.

Beeline has only recently launched. Your support is critical for starting profiles.

Unfortunately, there are no more users in your area to vote on. Please, stick with us.

We'll notify you if someone new signs up in your area.
You do not have any matches
Rank more profiles to find people who like you back.\n\n Beeline is a brand new app. There may not be any profiles left to rank. Be a hero and stick with us to start this.

Once you message a match, that match becomes locked. The daily algorithm won\'t remove the match.\n \n If you like the person, message them quickly. If you want someone "better," keep ranking more profiles.
Break the silence! Send a message!
A button that sends the current message.
This is the famous fuck off button.

Warning! This action cannot be undone! You will never ever hear or see this person again.
 
 Think long and hard before proceeding. You've told us your preferences. We've given you the best match that's interested in you. If you are going to reject this person, we are going to give you the next person down your list. If you ranked them right, you are going to like them less.
 
 If this isn't going anywhere, do the merciful thing. Throw this person back into the wild and tell this person to fuck off!
A button to report a user

Beeline is an Android app for online dating. You compare two profiles and pick the one you like better. With enough comparison picks, the app will create a ranking from whom you like the most to least.
 
 Next the app limits every user to maximum 10 matches. Matches are made based on whom you like the most and who likes you back. If you both are super popular, chances are you'll get matched up unless either of you runs out of matches. If you are more average attractive, chances are that your top choices will run out of matches before you'd even get considered. You'll likely end up matching with other average attractive people who couldn't get their first choices.
 
 There is of course the chance that you and your hottie are a niche. Say you are both super into punk. You might like each other back as number one while the world doesn't care about you two.

We've all been in group situations, e.g. a class or summer camp. After a little while, the group develops an understanding of who gets paired up with who. Jenny, the runner, goes with Fred, also a runner. James always watches indie flicks. He'll end up with April because she does the same.
 
 When we get to a big city with a big dating pool, we suddenly see the creme of the crop. Some of us won't settle for anything less and keep chasing unattainable "gods" and "goddesses." Beeline slots you with only a small number of matches that you actually have a chance with.
 
 Avoid wasting time by sending hundreds of messages to girls that never message you back. Avoid getting your inbox flooded by thousands of messages. Get focused right on a hand selected number of people that are your high value matches.
I love to hear from you. Send your feedback to thomas@playposse.com.

© 2017 Thomas Fischer

 The logo is a combination of artwork from the thenounproject.com:
 Lion by Polina Flegontovna from the Noun Project
 Middle Finger by Piotrek Chuchla from the Noun Project
 Sad emoji by Weltenraser from the Noun Project
To prevent errors, the Beeline will continue when network access is restored.

Having a short, concise profile with the most important information up front is critical.
 
 Users absorb profiles quickly to create a gut reaction and vote.
 
 This profile builder will help you create a profile snapshot like this:
 Santa Monica, CA - Wants long-term / engineer / no kids / yogi, adventurer / must like dogs
 
 Remember, only an about Twitter sizes message will show up during profile comparison. Of course, you can add more text for actual matches.
Orange marker shows how much will fit onto your profile in the rating screen.
Please be impatient and drum your fingers!
To match you up with local hotties, we gotta know where you are. Please, enable the location service.
Your session has expired. Please, log in again.\n\n Note: Your session will automatically expire when you sign into a different device.
An e-mail will be opened where you can send me feedback.
Please, send me your feedback. I care about hearing from you.
The profile photo of a user.
The thumbnail of a profile photo of a user.
A lock icon that indicates if a profile is locked or not.
An icon that indicates that a new message has arrived.
A heart shaped icon that indicates that you like that user.

1. Choose between two users repeatedly.
 2. The app creates a stack ranking.
 3. A daily algorithm matches for mutual attraction.
 4. Everyone is limited to the top 10 matches.
Woohoo! Beeline has new matches for you!
Once a day, Beeline runs an algorithm to pair the hotties of the world. The algorithm just finished running. You\'ve got some hot peeps to check out!
You\'ve had some matches in Beeline. Now they are gone.

Once a day, Beeline runs an algorithm to pair the hotties of the world. The last person just lost interest in you. But fret not. There are many things you can do. (1) Rank more users to find the special one who\'s into you. (2) Text your matches faster. Once you sent the first message, the match becomes locked. (3) This is the hardest yet most satisfying. Become more attractive. Hit the gym. Get new clothes. Put a smile on your face by following your passion.
Check out what a cutie is writing you!
Please, log in to check if there is someone new for you!
